nobr.config.title: No Bind Restrictions
nobr.config.master_enabled.tooltip: Globally enables or disables chain execution.
nobr.config.chain_actions.tooltip: One action per line. Supported: JUMP, SNEAK, LEFT_CLICK, RIGHT_CLICK, HOTBAR:0-8, DELAY:milliseconds
nobr.warning.title: No Bind Restrictions Warning
nobr.warning.body: This mod allows chaining multiple inputs into one key press. Some multiplayer servers may prohibit macro or automation mods. Only use this where permitted.
